      • setupMotesActivationStatus

        private void setupMotesActivationStatus()
        Gets the probability with which a mote should be active from the input profile of the current simulation. If no probability is specified, the probability is set to one. Then it performs a pseudo-random choice and sets the mote to active/inactive for the next run, based on that probability.

      • areAllMotesAtDestination

        private boolean areAllMotesAtDestination()
        Check if all motes have arrived at their destination.
        Returns:
        True if the motes are at their destinations.
